hopobject.name: SecureHome
hopobject.pname: BeagleBone Home Security and Automation System
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:12.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/12.0
hopobject.body: BeagleBone based home security system that monitors your home/office using wireless door,window and motion sensors. Can be controlled using a touch LCD screen and from the web. Provides SMS and email notification. Allows remote lights control via web. Provides live video feed and motion detection.
hopobject.shortdesc: BeagleBone based Home Security and Automation system Provides video feed and notification.
